pr_title: Added recursive functions validation check for group by

timeline.message:
Added recursive functions validation check for group by

The current validation rule for select-inside-groupby currently only consider exact match and Alias function.
There are many cases where composite functions are used in select-groupby too e.g. "select concat(foo,bar,'-'), count(*) ... group by foo, bar" is a valid query.

timeline.bodyText: Will this groupByExprs.contains(expr) handles functions or just for identifiers?
timeline.author: xiangfu0

replies.bodyText: Hi @fx19880617, it will handle all expression types (including nested). Expression overrides equals() & hashCode() so this should work for arbitrary Expression
replies.author: hotienvu
